Title: External storage app saves password for all users in the database

CWE.name: Storing Passwords in a Recoverable Format

Description: A missing condition in Nextcloud Server 19 and prior caused the external storage app to always store the users password in a recoverable format.
ActionTaken: The error has been fixed. Incorrectly stored passwords have been automatically cleaned-up from your database.
Resolution: It is recommended that the Nextcloud Server is upgraded to 20.0.0.
